segments.text: Within the platform, users can share files and folders with each other by using the username
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: which can be found on the bottom left of the screen by clicking the avatar.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Select My Workspace.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: From the Files section of the navigation menu, click the drive.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Mark the folder or the file.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Select the Share option and write the username of the collaborator with whom you want to
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: share the folder.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: It is also possible to share a file or folder using a link.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: The shared folders or files can be handled from the Shared Files section under Files
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: in the navigation menu on the left.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Here in the Shared with Me section, the user can accept sharing.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Users can also reject previously accepted sharing by clicking the Remove button.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: The user can also accept sharing from the main dashboard.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: In the Shared by Me section, the user can invite additional users to already shared
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: folders and files by clicking the Invite button.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: The user can also change the collaborator's permission and revoke the access to the shared
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: folders and files.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: The user can also change the collaborator's permission and revoke the access to the shared
folders and files.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: The user can also change the collaborator's permission and revoke the access to the shared
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: folders or files.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: The user can also change the collaborator's permission and revoke the access to the shared
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: folder or file.
The files or folders shared by collaborators with you are accessible from the Files section
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: in the navigation menu.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: If editing permissions have been granted, additional files can be uploaded inside the
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: shared folder by clicking the Upload Files button.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Now you can share data with your collaborators in a secure environment.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
